long_description: Tired of wasting money on shoddy umbrellas that don't stand up to your windy, blustery commutes? The strong, collapsible Blunt XS Metro Umbrella is the go-to choice for city dwellers. Compact, 2-stage design folds and fits into the included umbrella sleeve, which stows handily in your bag or briefcase. Patented tips and Radial Tensioning System (RTS) protect against heavy downpours and winds up to 70 MPH. RTS tensions the canopy, creating an unflappable aerodynamic structure that helps prevent the umbrella from turning inside out. The Blunt XS Metro Umbrella features a sleek shape with a stylish scalloped edge. Weight is 13.12 oz.
short_description: Tired of wasting money on shoddy umbrellas that don't stand up to your windy, blustery commutes? The strong, collapsible Blunt XS Metro Umbrella is the go-to choice for city dwellers.
